contents:
Little Donald: I'm Winnie the Pooh, Pooh Pooh Poooooooooh
Trump: No, my munchkin, that sounds like a shithole.
Little Donald: Come on!  Play with the Pooh!
Trump: I have been playing with the Pooh for a long time.
Little Donald: Don't you like Winnie the Poohï¼Ÿ
Trump: Of course not, Winnie is my grandson, isn't it?
